about_the_game:
This is a 2D side-scrolling adventure game with a nostalgic pixel art style. You and your friend will play as two cats with different abilities, embarking on an exciting journey across a mysterious and unfamiliar continent.

You must work together, using your unique skills, to traverse majestic snowy mountains, dangerous waterfalls, solve numerous puzzles, and defeat strange and unusual enemies. We hope you enjoy a fun and relaxing time in this magical world, experiencing the joy of cooperation and adventure.

Join the black and white cats and embark on this journey filled with challenges and surprises!

Game Features

  • Nostalgic 2D pixel art style, immersing players in a beautiful pixelated world.
  • Cooperative two-player mode, with each cat having different skills and abilities, requiring teamwork to overcome various difficulties and challenges.
  • More than ten diverse character states, including falling, getting wet, and flying, fully capturing the fun of being a cat.
  • Unexpected traps that force you to find ways to solve puzzles.
  • Hidden areas full of surprises, where you can take a moment to enjoy the tranquility.
